verbs.description: it all [V: has] to be dealt with a case for the vegan option continued thanks to the horse meat scandal tons of processed meat products are being removed from supermarket cabinets the waste is huge but the meat industry usually strives to avoid waste any part of an animal that can possibly be used for human consumption is made fit to eat right down to the stripping of bones mrm food industry european union organic farming pet food
